short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send To Notion: Send LinkedIn profiles to your Notion Database in 1 click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save LinkedIn profiles to your Notion in 1 click

Save time. Save LinkedIn profiles to Notion, with just one click. Send to Notion lets you use Notion as a CRM, from LinkedIn to Notion automatically. Get the company, location, job title, and profile picture saved in your Notion database.

✅ Automate

Boost your productivity with our one-click extension. Streamline your process by eliminating the need for manual copy/pasting. Jumpstart your efficiency with our predefined CRM template.


✅ CRM in Notion:
Replace expensive Linkedin Sales Navigator, Hubspot, and other expensive CRMs. 
Use Notion for everything. Manage your leads, prospects, and contacts with Notion’s kanban or board views.

✅ Email finder (launching soon)

Improve performance. Get a contact's email address and phone number directly in Notion with a click. This is ideal for your Sales team. 

✅ Get started

Send to Notion requires a Notion and LinkedIn account. 

✅ Free Credits Every Month
Jump in with 50 free credits monthly to save profiles directly to your Notion CRM, ensuring you have the resources to make the most out of your lead management.


Send to Notion is not an official Notion or Linkedin tool.
